title: Virtual Assistant and Skills workspace schema
description: This is a schema that captures the relationship between the virtual assistant and its skills.

$schema.description: The schema to verify this workspace file against

name.description: Name of the Virtual Assistant or Root Bot.

workspace.description: Path to the virtual assistant or Root Bot. Relative to the workspace file or an absolute path.

manifest.description: Path to the manifest file on local file system or a URL to a remote skill.

workspace.description: Path to the local skill project. If the workspace is local we use the file protocol as opposed to http/https for remote workspaces.

remote.description: Indication if the skill is remote or local skill.
remote.title: isRemote

endpointName.description: Indicates the name of the skill endpoint to use for writing the skill URL. If skill is remote no need for this property.
